entry.title: The Sorcerer Who Was Her
entry.summary:
Author: SChryslerS

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,150Chapters: 25/?Kudos: 442

Summary: The great and wise sorcerer, the closest confidant and most trusted ally of King Arthur, was born a girl. This single truth changes nothing—his wisdom remains boundless, his power undiminished, his destiny unshaken. And yet, it changes everything, for within this paradox lies a secret, a force beyond mere magic, one that reshapes not only his own fate but the fate of the world itself.

entry.title: Midnight snacks
entry.summary:
Author: httphowell

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,622Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 33

Summary: Only one person could be so clumsy while trying to be sneaky.Sure enough, as he reached the entrance to the kitchens, he was greeted with an all-too-familiar sight: Merlin, crouched by the pantry, stuffing bread and cheese into his mouth as if he hadn’t eaten in days.----------Arthur keeps catching Merlin sneaking into the kitchens at night for extra food. Instead of scolding him, he starts joining in. Eventually, it becomes their little tradition

entry.title: Of Nonchanters and Sorcerers
entry.summary:
Author: Electric_Dream

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,413Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 115

Summary: Sequel to Of Sorcerers and Nonchanters BBC Merlin but not like you know it.A role reversal.What if not having magic was illegal?What if Merlin was the prince instead of Arthur?What if Arthur was Merlin’s manservant?How would all of this change the story that we all know and love.*** Mordred had gotten what he had wanted.He had spread his hatred, his death and his destruction, killing and tearing down those that were in his way to the throne. He had slain countless of innocents including Ygraine, a loss that lay heavy inside of Arthur’s chest. He was barely holding on since his return to the world of the living he was sure that soon he was going to break. However, he was not going to let anyone see, he had to be strong, he had to be stoic and he had to be brave. He was Arthur Pendragon, the supposed King of a broken kingdom and supposed king of a dying race. The weight was on his shoulders and he did not have time to stop and think. If he did that, he probably will never return to his feet again. At least not whole..There was a great fight ahead of them that they were going to have to be ready for.No matter what.

entry.title: The Fragility of Innocence
entry.summary:
Author: httphowell

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,309Chapters: 5/27Kudos: 44

Summary: Merlin, the crown prince of Camelot, is renowned for his beauty and grace but lives a sheltered life under the watchful eye of his father, King Balinor, who views him as fragile. Unaware of the world beyond the castle walls, Merlin’s life changes when the brave knight Arthur enters the picture, showing him the depth of love and teaching him to find his own voice.Together, they must face the trials that come their way.

entry.title: Of Mice and Kings
entry.summary:
Author: MyAmisFics

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,968Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 34

Summary: Morgana transforms Arthur into a small mouse in a fit of rage. As a mouse, Arthur must now find his way back to Camelot and his friends, in the hope that they can help him. Thankfully, he has a manservant who adores small animals.- - - - - - - -“Hello, little one!” Merlin used the same high-pitched voice that he usually used on babies and kittens. Arthur would never admit that he found it adorable. He lifted his hands to get a closer look at Arthur, who found it strange to be so close to his face. Merlin smiled at him and gently stroked his back with one long finger.And so the day went by, with Merlin believing the King was off with his knights, and the knights believing he was in the armory with Merlin. No one would notice that their King was missing until dinner time, or even late evening depending on their schedules.- - - - - - - - -

entry.title: Dance til the Sun Comes Up (Kiss Me Like That)
entry.summary:
Author: thesongistheriver

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,057Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 95

Summary: Being the face of a new haute-couture men's line wasn't on Merlin's bucket list when he started modelling to pay for uni, but he's excited about it. Or he would be, if the photographer hadn't acted like such a jerk. (Too bad he's hot.)~*~*~Arthur loves being a photographer, but he hates everyone only using him to make them famous. At least he's got his friends around him ... and an annoying new up-and-coming model who happens to be just his type.~*~*~Sometimes, you find art where you least expect it.

entry.title: Kingdom Come
entry.summary:
Author: Bluliu

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,130Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 97

Summary: Merlin has waited centuries for Arthur. 1000 years later, he's losing hope. Until Arthur walks back into his life.Arthur Penn. Freshly 22 and conspicuously British despite going to college in northern Wisconsin, walks into a library for a school project. Why is that hot librarian staring at him?Or,Merlins been waiting for Arthur for ages but the whole time Arthur's been reincarnating with no memories. Until he see's Merlin. And will Merlin be honest with this blonde "stranger" about why he's in his dreams? Absolutely fucking not.

entry.title: Whereabouts of the Heart
entry.summary:
Author: perksofimmortality (akahomie)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,869Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: A Merlin parody of The Swan Princess (+ some Brave & Anastasia mixed in, too)As an act of goodwill following a successful peace treaty with Camelot, the leaders of the Dragonrider Clan offer High Dragonlord Balinor’s firstborn child to be the future betrothed of Uther Pendragon’s young son, the two-year-old Prince Arthur. Half a year later, when Lady Hunith gives birth to a baby boy, little Merlin is welcomed with open arms by both peoples.Now eleven and nine years old respectively, Arthur and Merlin are formally introduced for the first time, and it goes about as well as you’d expect (which is to say not at all). But no worries, they still have a decade to grow to like each other enough for the engagement to proceed without any problems. That’s a lot of time to fall in love... so it’s practically a done deal. Right?

entry.title: Queen Merlin
entry.summary:
Author: Sorcha2003

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 169,549Chapters: 70/?Kudos: 817

Summary: Prince Arthur Pendragon, always had something dark inside him, and he made his hatred clear to everyone. But it turns out that everything changed, when he found a little wizard named Merlin in the forest. Arthur never thought he could feel love, but when he saw Merlin he knew he must be his. So, watch their adventure while maintaining their love relationship. All this, hiding Merlin's magic from King Uther, while Arthur makes it clear that Merlin belongs to him.

entry.title: Bringer of Light, Darkness, Magic, and All Things Inbetween
entry.summary:
Author: witerwallyanerd

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,268Chapters: 2/28Kudos: 1

Summary: I’m probably gonna change the title, but right now that’s all I got.Merlin had been living a lie since he knew what one was. Ealdor lied in the border of Cenred’s kingdom and Camelot, and was much more tolerant of magic than Camelot was.Even so, you could only show so much ability before people got suspicious.So in Ealdor, it had always been playing down his abilities. He never imagined he was going to be hiding them completely. Merlin lived by Gaius’ rules, most of the time. Half the time. Whenever they didn’t get in his way, if he was being honest.However, recently, his magic had been itchy, for lack of better words. He felt it under his skin, in his veins, his hair. Heard it in every breath he breathed, every word that came from his mouth.

entry.title: Greater than or Equal to Perfect for You
entry.summary:
Author: perksofimmortality (akahomie)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,464Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 3

Summary: “You pompous... inconsiderate... jerkhead,” Merlin rages. “I’ve dreamed about going on this bloody trip since before I could even talk, and I am not letting you ruin my chances just because you make such an unbelievably terrible fake husband!”Or: AU. A famous and highly sought after deep space expedition is planned as a rest-of-your-lives thing, and thus the organizers only want couples to join. Merlin and Arthur find that their only option is to stage a whirlwind romance complete with wedding. They both figure that pretending to be married to someone who pisses you off like no one else is definitely worth it if you can go on the adventure of a lifetime... or is it?(A Perfect Foil rebuild of sorts)

entry.title: Our Eyes Full Of Promises
entry.summary:
Author: swishydetective

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,675Chapters: 12/12Kudos: 223

Summary: Once there was nothing left for them to do, they made their way to the Disir’s cave once more. As they arrived, Merlin started fidgeting nervously. Arthur noticed but he needed to stay focused on how to say the right thing. He planted his sword into the ground and made his way inside, Merlin following suit.“-Arthur Pendragon. You have returned with your decision?-I have.-Will you embrace the ways of the Old Religion, or will you seal your fate and follow the path of your father?”The King took a deep breath, and shifted his feet. He could feel Merlin’s eyes practically burning a hole in his neck.“I need to do what my heart tells me is right. I have decided to heed your warning and to learn to accept magic into Camelot." ORAfter Merlin accidentally reveals his magic to Arthur, the King of Camelot decides to reinstate magic back into the land. His relationship with Merlin is forever changed, and they grow even closer than they used to be. Will their love for each other be enough to beat the fates awaiting them?

entry.title: Lift and Coast
entry.summary:
Author: Sydelsquid

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,647Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 34

Summary: Arthur Pendragon is at the top of the Formula One world. He's bred for it, he excels in it, and he's losing himself in it. One would think that with all his success, he would be fulfilled and happy.And he was once right?After meeting the adorably oblivious Merlin, he thinks that he's never really known happiness outside of racing.
